body_html:
@honkentuber
I'm trying to do as you suggested, but when I call init_from_checkpoint from my model_fn it somehow mess the init operation...
I'm getting:
RuntimeError: Init operations did not make model ready for local_init. Init op: group_deps, init fn: None, error: Variables not initialized: ...

the trained model_dir is different then the old one, but both options didn't work for me.
any suggestions?

body:
@honkentuber 
I'm trying to do as you suggested, but when I call init_from_checkpoint from my model_fn it somehow mess the init operation...
I'm getting:
`RuntimeError: Init operations did not make model ready for local_init.  Init op: group_deps, init fn: None, error: Variables not initialized: ...`

the trained model_dir is different then the old one, but both options didn't work for me.
any suggestions?
